|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = 2

}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== *[[MikroTik CRS317-1G-16S+RM]] :CPU: Dual Core 800MHz, 1GB RAM, :16x SFP+ cages, 1x Gigabit LAN, :Smart Switch, Dual Power Supplies, :1U rackmount passive cooling case
The Cloud Router Switch series of devices is capable of running either :[[MikroTik]]'s RouterOS with the L5 feature set, or SwitchOS.
*CPU: [[Marvell]] 98DX8216 (ARM ''Prestera DX'') *16x SFP+ cages for SFP+ 1.25/10GbE modules. *1x GbE (1000BASE-T) RJ45 port for management. *1x Serial port with RJ45 connector.
==Links of Interest== [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/rb_files/CRS317-16splus-181112142620.png Block Diagram]
==See also== :[[MikroTik]] • [https://mikrotik.com/products/group/switches Switches] *[[MikroTik CRS326-24G-2S+RM]] - Cloud Router Switch • [https://mikrotik.com/product/CRS326-24G-2SplusRM PPage] :24x GbE ports, 2x SFP+ cages, 1U, Dual Boot (RouterOS/SwitchOS) *[[MikroTik CRS328-24P-4S+RM]] - Cloud Router Switch • [https://mikrotik.com/product/CRS326-24G-2SplusRM PPage] :24x GbE ports, 4x SFP+ (10Gbps) ports, 1U, Dual Boot, PoE output *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 3011 (RB3011UiAS-RM)]] • [https://mikrotik.com/product/RB3011UiAS-RM PPage] :10x Gigabit Ethernet ports, USB 3.0, LCD display *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 4011 (RB4011iGS+RM)]] • [https://mikrotik.com/product/rb4011igs_rm PPage] : 10x GbE ports, 1x SFP+ port, PoE 802.3af/at
[[Category:English Documentation]]
